mapper.sql: wodord.despatch_order_re_jo_re_det, wodord.despatch_order_re_jo_id, wodord.job_order_det_id, wodord.status, wodord.remark, wodord.org_id, wodord.create_user_id, wodord.create_time, wodord.modified_user_id, wodord.modified_time, wodord.is_delete
mapper.select:
SELECT ,wodo.despatch_order_code,bm.material_name,wodo.car_type,wodo.car_number,wodo.driver_name,su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, bo.organization_name AS organization_Name FROM wms_out_despatch_order_re_jo_re_det wodord LEFT JOIN wms_out_despatch_order_re_jo wodor ON wodord.despatch_order_re_jo_id = wodor.despatch_order_re_jo_id LEFT JOIN wms_out_despatch_order wodo ON wodor.despatch_order_id = wodo.despatch_order_id LEFT JOIN wms_inner_job_order_det wijod ON wodord.job_order_det_id = wijod.job_order_det_id LEFT JOIN base_material bm ON wijod.material_id = bm.material_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON wodord.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sus ON wodord.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN base_organization bo ON wodord.org_id = bo.organization_id
and wodo.despatch_order_id = #{despatchOrderId}
